coreAttributes.name: lowback bodysuit
coreAttributes.description: A bodysuit with a scooped low back and removable straps.

sticker.descriptionModification: The shoulder straps are currently attached to the body suit.
The shoulder straps have been removed from the body suit.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the lowback bodysuit and [npc.verb(pull)] it up to cover [npc.her] torso, before sliding the straps into place around [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to [npc2.step] into the lowback bodysuit and [npc.verb(pull)] it up to cover [npc2.her] torso, before sliding the straps into place around [npc2.her] shoulders.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to [npc2.step] into the lowback bodysuit and [npc.verb(yank)] it up to cover [npc2.her] torso, before sliding the straps into place around [npc2.her] shoulders.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] bodysuit's straps from off of [npc.her] shoulders before tugging it all the way down [npc.her] [npc.legs] and [npc.stepping] out of it.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit from off of [npc2.her] shoulders before tugging it all the way down [npc2.her] [npc2.legs] and making [npc2.herHim] [npc2.step] out of it.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit from off of [npc2.her] shoulders before forcefully tugging it all the way down [npc2.her] [npc2.legs] and making [npc2.herHim] [npc2.step] out of it.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the lower part of [npc.her] bodysuit back into its correct position so that [npc.her] groin is covered.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the lower part of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit back into its correct position so that [npc2.her] groin is covered.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the lower part of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit back into its correct position so that [npc2.her] groin is covered.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the lower part of [npc.her] bodysuit to one side in order to gain access to [npc.her] groin.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the lower part of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit to one side in order to gain access to [npc2.her] groin.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(yank)] the lower part of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit to one side in order to gain access to [npc2.her] groin.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the top part of [npc.her] bodysuit up into its correct position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the top part of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit up into its correct position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the top part of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit up into its correct position.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the top half of [npc.her] bodysuit.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the top half of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the top half of [npc2.namePos] bodysuit.
